issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
https://github.com/aws/aws-sdk-cpp/blob/master/cmake/external_dependencies.cmake#L9

If you happen to be building on a bare system without zlib, the bundled aws-sdk-cpp build fails: https://github.com/ursa-labs/arrow-r-nightly/runs/1227805500?check_suite_focus=true#step:4:930

comments.body:
[~kou] I'm not going to get to this today, maybe you can in your day? If not, I can take a look tomorrow. 

It might be as simple as adding {{if ARROW_S3 then ARROW_WITH_ZLIB}} and then registering zlib as a dependency in build_awssk in case both are being bundled.
OK. I'll take a look this.
